acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 28 byteObjectField = 56 shortField = 125 shortObjectField = 118 charField = e charObjectField = L intField = 1812290514 intObjectField = -481601421 longField = 1713273527449606 longObjectField = 1713273525880850 floatField = 0.9586556 floatObjectField = 0.8734522 doubleField = 0.9012986393179199 doubleObjectField = 0.8173723943986821 stringField = u2JPZg9P8C objectField = java.lang.Object@2d2ec76 calendarField = Sun Sep 27 14:32:21 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Sep 27 14:32:21 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@255130e3 intArray = [I@9405163 booleanArray = [Z@15ad8968 bigDecimalField = 276220222994 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{L8BKDQEkX6=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1443360741847 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@fbba04a elements
